schema.description: Starts a new sale with the given parameters. The sale info can be modified before it has started but is immutable after that.

price.title: Price

schema.title: Cw721 start sale

alerts.text: The sale info can be modified before it has started but is immutable after that.

coin_denom.ui:title: Coin Denom
coin_denom.ui:description: Enter the coin denomination. These will be in micro units so ANDR will be uandr (lower case letters).

price.ui:title: Price
price.ui:description: Enter the price. Note: The price will be in micro units so make sure to confirm your amount.
